name: CommsQuest IV Twilio 5 Minute Deployable Demo
description: A 3D puzzle maze game played using your tablet or laptop, and your phone as a controller.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio Account SID. Get a free account at twilio.com/try-twilio

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio Auth Token. You can get it at twilio.com/console

TWILIO_PHONE_NUMBER.description: The Twilio phone number you want to use to send SMS. Get one in the Twilio Console

SYNC_SERVICE_SID.description: The Twilio Sync Service used to update ball movement and game state. Get one in the Twilio Console.

TWILIO_API_KEY.description: Used to create an Access Token. Get one in the Twilio Console.

TWILIO_API_SECRET.description: The secret for the Twilio API Key.

PUBLIC_DOMAIN.description: Required to receive a text message with a link to open on your phone.
